scripts.copy-verbatim-directories: shx mkdir -p ./dist/icons && cd ./src && shx cp -R icons ../dist/
scripts.build:local-dev: cross-env-shell BUILD_ENV=local-dev "npm run generate-key-pair-if-not-generated && shx rm -rf dist && npx webpack && gulp copy-verbatim-directories && npm run copy-verbatim-files && npm run render-manifest-from-package-json"
scripts.build:updated-deploy: cross-env-shell BUILD_ENV=updated-deploy "npm run generate-key-pair-if-not-generated && shx rm -rf dist && npx webpack && gulp copy-verbatim-directories && npm run copy-verbatim-files && npm run render-manifest-from-package-json"
scripts.build:initial-deploy: cross-env-shell BUILD_ENV=initial-deploy "npm run generate-key-pair-if-not-generated && shx rm -rf dist && npx webpack && gulp copy-verbatim-directories && npm run copy-verbatim-files && npm run render-manifest-from-package-json && cp private-key.pem dist/key.pem"
scripts.generate-derived-public-key: 2>/dev/null openssl rsa -in private-key.pem -pubout -outform DER | openssl base64 -A -out public-key-base64.txt
scripts.generate-key-pair: npm run generate-private-key && npm run generate-derived-public-key
scripts.generate-key-pair-if-not-generated: (shx test -f private-key.pem && shx test -f public-key-base64.txt) || npm run generate-key-pair
